mapper.select: select ad_id, ad_name, ad_tel, ad_address, ad_zipCode, u_id, ad_default_address, es_1, es_2, es_3 from address where ad_id = #{adId}
mapper.insert: insert into address(ad_name, ad_tel, ad_address, ad_zipCode, u_id, ad_default_address, es_1, es_2, es_3) values (#{adName}, #{adTel}, #{adAddress}, #{adZipcode}, #{uId}, #{adDefaultAddress}, #{es1}, #{es2}, #{es3})

insert into address(ad_name, ad_tel, ad_address, ad_zipCode, u_id, ad_default_address, es_1, es_2, es_3) values
(#{entity.adName}, #{entity.adTel}, #{entity.adAddress}, #{entity.adZipcode}, #{entity.uId}, #{entity.adDefaultAddress}, #{entity.es1}, #{entity.es2}, #{entity.es3})

insert into address(ad_name, ad_tel, ad_address, ad_zipCode, u_id, ad_default_address, es_1, es_2, es_3) values
(#{entity.adName}, #{entity.adTel}, #{entity.adAddress}, #{entity.adZipcode}, #{entity.uId}, #{entity.adDefaultAddress}, #{entity.es1}, #{entity.es2}, #{entity.es3})
on duplicate key update ad_name = values(ad_name), ad_tel = values(ad_tel), ad_address = values(ad_address), ad_zipCode = values(ad_zipCode), u_id = values(u_id), ad_default_address = values(ad_default_address), es_1 = values(es_1), es_2 = values(es_2), es_3 = values(es_3)
mapper.update:
update address
ad_name = #{adName},
ad_tel = #{adTel},
ad_address = #{adAddress},
ad_zipCode = #{adZipcode},
u_id = #{uId},
ad_default_address = #{adDefaultAddress},
es_1 = #{es1},
es_2 = #{es2},
es_3 = #{es3},
where ad_id = #{adId}
